attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
that the proposed payout for resigned mps be suspended withdrawn or ammended to 
 after all previous illegal claims have been clawed back by inland revenue they will recieve what is left if anything

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or with the individual political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
